dc.title: U.S. FDA / Center for Food Safety and Applied Nutrition
dc.description: The Center for Food Safety and Applied Nutrition is one of six centers within FDA. The Center promotes and protects the public health and economic interest by ensuring that: Food is safe, nutritious and wholesome, cosmetics and dietary supplements are safe and food, cosmetics, and dietary supplements are honestly, accurately and informatively labeled.
